name: WikiCite 2018
contribution: Presenting a talk about: OSCAR and LUCINDA with Wikidata
description: WikiCite 2018 is a 3-day conference, summit, and hack day dedicated to the vision of creating an open repository of bibliographic data to support the citation and fact-checking needs of Wikimedia projects, and possibly, to serve as an open infrastructure for research, education, and information quality across the web.
